main event: An unidentified aerial object was observed in the northern sky, appearing to hover near the ground and changing to a brilliant spot of light before fading from view.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 2-3 seconds., It appeared to be low to the ground and did not move with any apparent speed., The report mentions that similar observations have been made in the past., The object did not resemble a comet, meteor, meteorite, or satellite., The witness described the object as having a low humming sound.
sighted object: a brilliant object in the northern sky
witness description: The object appeared startling and was described as having a rounded elongated octagon shape, moving with zigzag patterns and producing a low humming sound.
